Kremlin says election result shows Russian people consolidated around PutinThe Kremlin said on Monday that the results of Russia's presidential election showed that the Russian people are consolidated around President Vladimir Putin. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 10:18:28 GMT CFSQ6BHFWVL77G6FKPJCRMQC7A https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/kremlin-says-election-result-shows- Russian-people-consolidated-around-putin-2024-03-18/Reuters世界欧洲
EU's Borrell says Israel is provoking famine in GazaEU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell said on Monday that Israel is provoking famine in Gaza and using starvation as a weapon of war, an accusation Israel's foreign minister rejected. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 10:14:26 GMT DUJEB556PFIAXIM43UX7ZIP7EA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/eus-borrell-says-israel-is-provoking-famine-gaza-2024-03-18/Reuters世界中东
Zimbabwe goes hungry as crops wither amid El Nino droughtResidents of the Zimbabwean village of Buhera stood in groups at a primary school waiting to be called by name to receive life-saving handouts of grain, peas and cooking oil. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 10:12:14 GMT IG2TVTALVZICFL2TQDKEPFDUB4 https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/zimbabwe-goes-hungry-crops-wither-amid-el-nino-drought-2024-03-18/Nyasha Chingono商业环境
U.S. VP Harris to discuss migration with Guatemala's Arévalo at White HouseU.S. Vice President Kamala Harris will meet with Guatemala's new liberal president, Bernardo Arévalo, at the White House next week to discuss bolstering democracy and addressing the "root causes" of migration from Central America, officials told Reuters. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 10:08:48 GMT TT632HFF3VMT5BJNI63KITONAY https://www.reuters.com/world/us-vp-harris-meet-with-guatemalas-arvalo-next-week-white-house-2024-03-18/Jeff Mason世界
Arizona county faces 'homelessness on steroids' as migrant shelter funds run outAn Arizona migrant shelter that has housed thousands of asylum seekers plans to halt most operations in two weeks when funding from Washington runs out, a problem for towns along the border where officials fear a surge in homelessness and extra costs. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 10:05:52 GMT 5OVKWN7OZFPKPBWPV63ZEJAEG4 https://www.reuters.com/world/us/arizona-county-faces-homeless-steroids-migrant-shelter-funds-run-out-2024-03-18/Ted Hesson, Liliana Salgado世界美国
France condemns vote in Ukraine's regions occupied by RussiaFrance said on Monday the re-election of Russian President Vladimir Putin took place amid repression, and it praised the many Russians who had peacefully protested against the election. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 09:52:18 GMT NHQLVFREPNOFZI7ANP5DDON47E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/france-condemns-vote-ukraines-regions-占领-by-Russia-2024-03-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Russia's election wasn't a real election, Germany's Baerbock saysThe election in Russia was not a real election, German Foreign Minister Annalena Baerbock said on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 09:44:56 GMT BVXIOGDOGROX3NBTNTBIRQUB3E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russias-election-wasnt-real-election-germanys-baerbock-says-2024-03-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Iceland volcano still pouring out fountains of lavaA volcano in Iceland that erupted on Saturday for the fourth time since December was still spewing smoke and bright orange lava into the air early on Monday although infrastructure and a nearby fishing town were safe for now, authorities said. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 09:43:46 GMT IA7FWYGWYVKIDHO6MCQBQFXQ2E https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/iceland-volcano-still-pouring-out-fountains-lava-2024-03-18/Reuters商业环境
China's military, state media slam U.S. after Reuters report on SpaceX spy satellitesChinese military and state-run media on Sunday accused the United States of threatening global security, days after a Reuters report which found Elon Musk's SpaceX was building hundreds of spy satellites for a U.S. intelligence agency. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 09:33:57 GMT X6HAOY6SLNIVPMKPNPJVIQDD2A https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-military-state-media-slam-us-after-reuters-report-spacex-spy-satellites-2024-03-18/Reuters世界中国
Nigeria military denies reprisal attack after 16 troops killedMen in army uniform ransacked and burned homes in Nigeria's oil-producing Delta state days after youths killed 16 soldiers sent there to resolve a land dispute, residents said, but the defence chief denied military involvement. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 09:26:36 GMT 7JLPH4GA2ZMDNCAISBWCIXXNDY https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/nigeria-military-denies-reprisal-attack-after-16-troops-killed-2024-03-18/Tife Owolabi, Ope Adetayo世界非洲
Israel to offer six-week Gaza truce for 40 hostages in Qatar talks, Israeli official saysIsrael will send a high-level delegation headed by its Mossad chief to Qatar on Monday for mediated talks with Hamas designed to secure a six-week Gaza truce under which the Palestinian militants would free 40 hostages, an Israeli official said. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 08:15:10 GMT FDRVLK467NOTNKUCJJ2ON5MS2Q https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-offer-six-week-gaza-truce-40-hostages-qatar-talks-israeli-official-says-2024-03-18/Reuters世界中东
